mapper.sql: user_relation.id as user_relation_id, user_relation.self_user as user_relation_self_user, user_relation.another_user as user_relation_another_user, user_relation.relation_type as user_relation_relation_type, user_relation.operating_time as user_relation_operating_time
mapper.insert: insert into user_relation (self_user, another_user, relation_type, operating_time) values (#{selfUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{anotherUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{relationType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{operatingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into user_relation
self_user,
another_user,
relation_type,
operating_time,

mapper.update:
update user_relation
self_user = #{selfUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
another_user = #{anotherUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
